transcript.text: Shalom this is daniel john lee with
torah restoration ministries I just
wanted to create a YouTube to promote my
brand new blog and i'm using that i
created using wordpress i've been
wanting to make a blog for probably the
last several months and i finally got
around to creating one it's pretty easy
to set up and i have about i think about
eight or nine different blog posts now
they're just basically short articles
about my thoughts about current things
and i have a couple poems thrown in and
things like that so anyway if you want
to check out the blog i will put the
link to the blog right beneath this
video in the in the description tab
beneath the the youtube so just click on
that link and it will take you right to
my blog and enjoy i'm pretty much
posting I don't know I guess an article
or two poem or two every day or every
couple days so I'm really enjoying this
outlet to be able to write it's really
healthy for a writer that's for sure
anyway I hope you enjoy my blog as much
as I'm enjoying blogging alright thanks
bye
